name: Keke Challenge Car Dance Fun
description:
Have you heard about the keke challenge? Of course yes but have you played this type of game? Definitely not. Let’s play this fun dance challenge game with a unique love challenge of keke. Start this funny video keke game challenge that will drive you crazy. Dance on different music challenge and complete the missions in this kiki music challenge. Show that you can hip hop dance besides the running car. Open the door of the car and come out of it and dancing!!

All you need to have skills about how to dance. Come out of the car and start dancing on different music and songs. Win the music challenge now. Enjoy the dance fun love challenge. Save yourself from different hurdles and obstacles to complete your mission and win the dance fun game. Hip hop dance on the road with a running car but be careful about the hurdles otherwise you will going to fail in the mission.

Download this epic dance fun game with different challenges to face and complete. Enjoy the funny video dance challenge. We are introducing the interesting game of love kiki challenge. Accept the challenge and complete the missions now. Get addicted to this fun dance game and enjoy.

HOW TO PLAY THIS GAME
• Tap to start the keke challenge now
• Select the car among 6 different cars to drive
• Select the level to start your mission
• Now time to start the mission
• Open the door of the car with one tap
• Choose different dance styles options
• Choose your favorite songs for the dance fun
• Keep track on the bar so that you can watchful if there is a hurdle ahead of you during dance

FEATURES
• Fun game
• 10 exciting levels to play
• Different cars to choose for dancing
• Different characters to choose for the keke challenge
• Warning bar that tells the distance from the hurdles
